patterns.title: Evidence Gates
patterns.summary: No phase proceeds without logged proof.
patterns.what: Gate criteria that must pass before a phase completes.
patterns.why: Stops approvals without evidence and keeps work auditable.
how: Define exit criteria per phase.
Attach evidence artifacts (tests, build output, hashes).
Verify via Evidence & Gates before advancing.
patterns.quick: No phase proceeds without logged proof.

patterns.title: Stop Conditions
patterns.summary: Explicit triggers halt work and require a decision.
patterns.what: Predefined conditions that force a stop and a decision record.
patterns.why: Prevents working around failures and hides regressions.
how: Define stop triggers before work starts.
Halt on trigger and log the reason.
Resume only after a documented decision.
patterns.quick: Explicit triggers halt work and force a decision.

patterns.title: Clean Verification
patterns.summary: Verify in a clean environment before release.
patterns.what: Fresh clone + venv verification to eliminate hidden state.
patterns.why: Local environments lie; clean runs reveal drift.
how: Clone to a clean temp directory.
Create a fresh venv and install dependencies.
Run tests, build, and audit tools.
patterns.quick: Verify in a clean environment before release.

patterns.title: Claim Labeling
patterns.summary: Every claim is labeled Verified, Building, or Target.
patterns.what: Status tags on every public claim with evidence or intent.
patterns.why: Prevents accidental lies and sets clear expectations.
how: Verified claims require evidence + method.
Building claims show in-progress proof.
Target claims are explicit and labeled.
patterns.quick: Every claim is labeled Verified, Building, or Target.

patterns.title: Agent Charters
patterns.summary: Single-approval autonomy with explicit scope and stop rules.
patterns.what: A charter defines scope, decision policy, and stop conditions.
patterns.why: Enables autonomy without drift or unsafe changes.
how: Define allowed paths and forbidden areas.
Set autonomous vs approval-only actions.
Require evidence logging per cycle.
patterns.quick: Single-approval autonomy with explicit scope and stops.

patterns.title: Health Baselines
patterns.summary: Capture system health and block regressions.
patterns.what: Baseline snapshots for tests, security, and lint.
how: Capture pip-audit, pytest, and lint counts.
Compare against the last baseline in CI.
Update baselines only when metrics improve.
patterns.quick: Capture health baselines and block regressions.

patterns.title: Public Proof
patterns.summary: Publish aggregated proof without exposing IP.
patterns.what: Aggregate metrics that prove process integrity.
patterns.why: Builds trust without leaking internal details.
how: Export counts, rates, and outcomes only.
Exclude file paths and roadmap specifics.
Link proof summaries to the registry.
patterns.quick: Publish aggregated proof without exposing IP.
